decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of gates to mana fix and counterspells to disrupt opponent's strategies. Cards like Citadel Gate and Sea Gate help ramp up mana while Counterspell and Spell Pierce counter opponent's threats. Journey to Nowhere and Lórien Revealed provide removal options, while Squadron Hawk and Sacred Cat offer defense and card advantage. The deck aims to stall the game until it can establish a strong board presence with cards like Guardian of the Guildpact and Basilisk Gate to ultimately secure victory.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently mill through your own deck using cards like Balustrade Spy and Dread Return to set up an explosive win condition with Lotleth Giant. The deck focuses on generating mana with creatures like Overgrown Battlement and Saruli Caretaker, while also digging for key pieces with spells like Lead the Stampede and Winding Way. By setting up the combo pieces and using creature recursion, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a huge amount of damage in a single turn.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts and sacrificing them for value in order to deal damage quickly and efficiently to the opponent. By combining affinity creatures with artifacts that can be sacrificed, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a burst of damage output. Additionally, the deck includes a mix of removal and card draw to maintain tempo and consistency throughout the game. With a low mana curve and an aggressive playstyle, this deck aims to close out games swiftly before the opponent has a chance to react.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent using low-cost creatures and direct damage spells. The synergy between cards like Sneaky Snacker and Highway Robbery allows for efficient creature removal and life gain. The deck also includes burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper to deal direct damage to the opponent while also controlling the board. Overall, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle.

The main concept of this deck revolves around the combo of using Balustrade Spy to mill your entire deck, then using Dread Return to bring back Lotleth Giant for massive damage to the opponent. The deck also focuses on ramping up as quickly as possible with cards like Gatecreeper Vine and Saruli Caretaker, while also utilizing cards like Mesmeric Fiend and Masked Vandal for disruption. The goal is to quickly assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a burst of damage before they have a chance to react.

The focus of this deck is to maintain a fast-paced aggressive strategy by utilizing cheap spells and efficient creatures to put pressure on the opponent. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's plans with counterspells and card draw, while simultaneously deploying threats like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent to quickly close out the game. By effectively managing resources and leveraging tempo advantage, the Mono Blue Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through efficient play and calculated aggression.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with low-cost creatures like Delver of Secrets and Murmuring Mystic while controlling the game with counter spells like Counterspell and Force Spike. Card advantage is gained through cards like Brainstorm and Deep Analysis, while Tolarian Terror and Sleep of the Dead help maintain tempo advantage. The deck aims to be aggressive and efficient, utilizing card draw and disruption to maintain a constant pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with low-cost white creatures to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive attacks. The inclusion of cards like Guardians' Pledge and Battle Screech allows for the generation of additional creature tokens for even more pressure. The deck also includes some support cards like Kor Skyfisher and Thraben Inspector to provide value and card advantage. The goal is to maintain a steady stream of creatures on the battlefield while utilizing combat tricks and protection spells like Prismatic Strands to ensure victory.

This deck focuses on using cheap counter spells, removal, and card draw to control the game. The key strategy is to disrupt the opponent's plans, while maintaining card advantage and tempo. Creatures like Ninja of the Deep Hours and Augur of Bolas provide additional card advantage, while Faerie Seer and Spellstutter Sprite help control the board. The inclusion of Thorn of the Black Rose and Murmuring Mystic offers additional win conditions. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through attrition.

The main focus of this Dimir Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy through card advantage and removal spells, while also efficiently deploying threats like Gurmag Angler. The deck utilizes a combination of counterspells, removal, and card draw to control the game and outvalue the opponent. With a mix of cheap spells like Thought Scour and Brainstorm, along with powerful finishers like Snuff Out and Lórien Revealed, this deck aims to grind out the opponent and secure victory through attrition.

This deck is focused on quickly ramping up mana using mana dorks like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves, as well as Priest of Titania. It utilizes cards like Quirion Ranger and Timberwatch Elf to enable powerful attacks with creatures like Avenging Hunter and Nyxborn Hydra. Masked Vandal provides utility by dealing with opponent's threats, while Wellwisher helps to gain valuable life to stay in the game. Lead the Stampede and Winding Way help to refill the hand with more creatures, ensuring a steady stream of threats to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and burn spells. By using efficient creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Burning-Tree Emissary, along with powerful burn spells such as Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, the deck aims to quickly deal damage and finish off the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The deck also includes cards like Rally at the Hornburg and Reckless Impulse to maintain card advantage and keep up the pressure. Ultimately, the goal is to win the game as quickly as possible through aggressive plays and efficient damage output.

This deck focuses on quickly generating artifacts to power up the affinity mechanic, allowing for a fast and aggressive playstyle. It also includes cards that can sacrifice artifacts for additional benefits, providing versatility and strategic options. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of powerful artifact creatures and direct damage spells, while also disrupting their game plan with graveyard hate and removal spells. The deck's mana base is designed to support the artifact-heavy strategy and maximize efficient card draw and damage output.

The main concept of this Pauper 1 vs 1 Control - Gates deck is to use a combination of gates and control spells to stay ahead of opponents. By utilizing cards like Basilisk Gate, Citadel Gate, and Sea Gate for mana fixing and advantage, along with Counterspell and Journey to Nowhere for removal and disruption, the deck aims to control the game and outlast opponents. The addition of cards like Sacred Cat, Squadron Hawk, and Outlaw Medic provide additional utility and resiliency. Overall, the strategy is to establish a strong defense and slowly grind down opponents while maintaining card advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of removal spells and lifegain effects. By utilizing cards like Cast Down, Defile, and Crypt Rats to eliminate threats, while also gaining life through cards like Campfire and Ichor Wellspring, the deck aims to outlast opponents and maintain board control. The inclusion of cards like Troll of Khazad-dûm and Thorn of the Black Rose provide additional ways to generate value and advantage in the late game, allowing the deck to grind out wins against aggressive strategies.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build up a strong board presence of low-cost creatures with powerful enchantments to boost their abilities. By using a combination of protection spells and auras, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. With a solid base of white weenie creatures and support cards, the deck is designed to maintain pressure on the opponent and deliver consistent damage while also protecting its own creatures.
